org.hkijena.acaq5.api

Class ACAQProject

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hkijena.acaq5.api.ACAQProject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ACAQValidatable

    public class ACAQProject
extends Object
implements ACAQValidatable
    An ACAQ5 project. It contains all information to setup and run an analysis

    • Method Detail

      • getStateIdOf

        public ACAQProjectCache.State getStateIdOf(ACAQAlgorithm node,
                                           List<ACAQGraphNode> traversed)
        Returns the state ID of a graph node The state ID is a unique representation of how the algorithm's output was generated. This is used by the data cache.
        Parameters:
        node - the target algorithm
        traversed - traversed graph. should be ACAQAlgorithmGraph.traverseAlgorithms(). This parameter is here for performance reasons.
        Returns:
        unique representation of how the algorithm's output was generated.

      • setWorkDirectory

        public void setWorkDirectory(Path workDirectory)
        Sets the folder where the project is currently working in. This information is passed to the algorithms to adapt to the work directory if needed (usually ony Filesystem nodes are affected)
        Parameters:
        workDirectory - Project work directory

      • loadDependenciesFromJson

        public static Set<ACAQDependency> loadDependenciesFromJson(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode node)
        Deserializes the set of project dependencies from JSON. Does not require the dependencies to be actually registered.
        Parameters:
        node - JSON node
        Returns:
        The dependencies as ACAQMutableDependency
